statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.Currency , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice
, M1.Name as CurrencyName
FROM dbo.BGGoodsPrice AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Currency = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'Currency' WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.Currency , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice
FROM dbo.BGGoodsPrice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGGoodsPrice ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsID, Currency, ListPrice, SalePrice ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsID#, #Currency#, #ListPrice#, #SalePrice# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGGoodsPrice SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , Currnecy = #Currency# , ListPrice = #ListPrice# , SalePrice = #SalePrice# WHERE ID = #ID#
